mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.description, a.start_time as startTime, a.end_time as endTime, a.location, a.status, a.participant_count as participantCount, a.created_at as createdAt FROM cultural_activities a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.description, a.start_time as startTime, a.end_time as endTime, a.location, a.status, a.participant_count as participantCount, a.created_at as createdAt, u.user_name as publisherName FROM cultural_activities a INNER JOIN cultural_participants p ON a.id = p.activity_id INNER JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.start_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cultural_activities a INNER JOIN cultural_participants p ON a.id = p.activity_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId}
